arts.ttl: Man Utd transfer news: First January signing confirmed as Viktor Gyokeres drops fresh hint
arts.sum: Manchester United have just a matter of weeks to complete the preparations for the upcoming January transfer window but already appear to have gotten their first signing over the line

arts.ttl: Casper Nielsen comes off the bench to grab huge Champions League victory for Club Brugge
arts.sum: Club Brugge grabbed a huge victory on Tuesday night in the Champions League. The Belgian champions all but secured their passage through to the next round with a 2-1 win…

arts.ttl: Man United transfer news: Viktor Gyokeres fuels speculation with Cristiano Ronaldo admission
arts.sum: Sporting Lisbon forward Viktor Gyokeres adds fuel to speculation linking him with Manchester United by revealing that he would like to emulate Cristiano Ronaldo's achievements.

arts.ttl: Gyokeres hints at next club as he seeks to emulate two idols
arts.sum: Manchester United and Arsenal target Viktor Gyokeres has named two former Red Devils players as his footballing idols. And Gyokeres, in revealing his footballing idols, may have inadvertently boosted Man Utd's hope of landing one of Europe's most reliable goalscorers.

arts.ttl: Club Brugge v Sporting CP Preview | Belgian champions looking to cement place in the top 24 of the Champions League
arts.sum: Club Brugge have performed well in the newly revamped Champions League format. In their five games so far, the side have won two, drawn one and lost two. Even in…
James Milton assesses all 18 matches in the Champions League this week and delivers a score prediction for every game.

arts.ttl: Gyokeres barges exit door open amid Sporting crisis: €100m January deal on
arts.sum: Viktor Gyokeres has the exit door at Sporting CP open to him as the Lisbon club has been plunged into crisis following the departure of Ruben Amorim to Manchester United . The 26-year-old has been one of the hottest players on the transfer market for months, yet his attractiveness has only been heightened by a start to the season that has seen him score 25 goals in 22 games.

arts.ttl: Manchester United Viktor Gyokeres latest: Ruben Amorim to battle European giant for Sporting Lisbon striker?
arts.sum: Manchester United have reportedly been dealt a blow in their pursuit of Viktor Gyokeres, who has emerged as a primary target to lead Paris Saint-Germain's attack.
